title: Ida Dansy's Christmas Pudding
ingredients: ['1 wineglass of brandy or rum, and more as needed', '225g raisins', '225g currants', '225g sultanas', '110g (4 oz) mixed peel', '175g plain flour and', '50g self-raising flour', '225g butter or suet, chilled and grated', '225g dark brown Demerara sugar', '6 eggs', '1 teaspoon of vanilla extract', 'a pinch of salt', '1 teaspoon allspice', '2 apples, peeled and grated', '225g breadcrumbs', '110g (4 oz) slivered almonds']
